Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Shield Bash, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Bludgeoning and can knock prone
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Javelin, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 30/120ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Hobgoblin makes 3 Melee attacks, or 2  Ranged attacks with its Javelins
Other Actions.Action 2: Leadership, The Hobgoblin issues a special command or warning to a creature making an attack roll or saving throw, allowing that creature to add a d4 to its roll
Other Actions.Action 3: Parry, The Hobgoblin parries a melee attack against it, raising its AC

Abilities.Ability 1: Martial Advantage, The Hobgoblin uses its knowledge of weapons to deal extra damage against a target while that creature is within 5ft of an ally of the Hobgoblin (it's Pack Tactics but damage instead of advantage)
